CustomField.formula: CASE( Entity_Type__c , 'Pvt Ltd' , '11' , 'Public Ltd' , '12' , 'Business Entities Created by Statute' , '20' , 'Proprietorship' , '30' , 'Partnership' , '40' , 'Limited Liability Partnership', '40' , 'Trust' , '50' , 'HUF' , '55' , 'Co-Operative Society' , '60' , 'Assosiation of Persons' , '70' , 'Govt' , '80', '0')
CustomField.label: Entity Code
